mainMetaData.title: Ghislain Genay - Software Engineer
mainMetaData.description: This blog explores the world of software engineering. From frontend (NextJS, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, Javascript, UI Framework) to backend and database 5SQL and NoSQL, from design to deployment, from code to production. Everything is covered. The main goal is to share my knowledge and experience with the community.

bioPage.summary: After working for 2 years as an R&D Engineer, I decided to switch career and become a programmer. I am currently working as a full stack developer where I acquired problem solving skills and clean code philosophy. I am currently working during my free time on my web app (personal blog with NextJS / Markdown) and data science skills.

missions.scalableWebApp: Developing scalable full-stack web applications using JavaScript / TypeScript / HTML / CSS / ReactJS / AntDesign / NextJS / NodeJS / SQL (MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB)
missions.jira: Collaboration with other developers in complex projects using Agile Methodologies and Git version control (JIRA, Bitbucket)
missions.cmsFeatures: Creation of new features in Control Management System application using RESTful APIs (e.g. message, email templates, reservation, logging system)
missions.startUp: Working in a start-up environment with a small team of developers
missions.dataAnalysis: Carried out data scraping and machine learning projects (recover data from website and verify car pictures with AI models)

missions.learning: 7 weeks (280 hours) of intensive training on full-stack JavaScript development (front-end, back-end, database).
missions.developedWebApp: Developed web applications using technologies including JavaScript / CSS3 / Bootstrap / HTML5 / Handlebars / Node.js / Express / MongoDB / ReactJS / Git

keyResults.cdCiPipeline: Implement a complete and functional CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions
keyResults.useGit: Utilized Git version control and GitHub
keyResults.problemSolving: Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and adaptability
keyResults.auth: Implemented authentication and authorization mechanisms using JWT cookies
keyResults.testing: Tested the application using Jest and React Testing Library
keyResults.api: Developed robust APIs using NestJS, ensuring smooth communication between frontend and backend components
keyResults.cleanCode: Followed the clean code principle by sharing code using git submodules
keyResults.workflow: Implemented web application workflow from testing to deployment online
keyResults.codeSharing: Shared code between frontend and backend components using git submodules

keyResults.robustApi: Developed a robust backend API using Django's REST framework
keyResults.orm: Utilized Django's ORM to interact with the database
